com.gilran.chess.board

Class PositionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gilran.chess.board.PositionBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForsythEdwardsNotation, Position

     class PositionBase
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for chess position and position-like (such as annotations) classes.
    Author:
    Gil Ran

    • Field Detail

      • piecesPlacement

        protected PiecesPlacement piecesPlacement
        The pieces placement.

      • activePlayer

        protected Piece.Color activePlayer
        The player whos turn it is to make a move.

      • castlingRights

        protected CastlingRights castlingRights
        The castling rights of each side. For each side, the inner map will have KING_SIDE and QUEEN_SIDE as keys, and a boolean indicating if the side is holding the right to castle in that direction.

      • halfMovesClock

        protected int halfMovesClock
        The number of halfmoves since the last capture or pawn advance. This is used to determine if a draw can be claimed under the fifty-move rule.

      • enPassantTarget

        protected Coordinate enPassantTarget
        The target square for an en passant capture. If null, the last move was not a 2 squares pawn advance.

      • currentMove

        protected int currentMove
        The number of the current (full) move. A game starts at move 1 (so this is 1-based).

      • kingPosition

        protected java.util.Map<Piece.Color,Coordinate> kingPosition
        The positions of the kings. This is used to test for checks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PositionBase

        protected PositionBase()
        Default constructor.

      • PositionBase

        protected PositionBase(PositionBase other)
        Copy constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getPiecesPlacement

        public PiecesPlacement getPiecesPlacement()
        Retruns a copy of the pieces placement.

        A copy is returned in order to prevent clients from changing the position's internal pieces placement.

      • getActivePlayer

        public Piece.Color getActivePlayer()
        Returns the color whos turn it is to make a move.

      • getCastlingRights

        private CastlingRights getCastlingRights()
        Returns a copy of the castling rights.

        A copy is returned in order to prevent clients from changing the position's internal castling rights.

      • getHalfMovesClock

        protected int getHalfMovesClock()
        Returns the number of halfmoves since the last capture or pawn advance.

      • getEnPassantTarget

        protected Coordinate getEnPassantTarget()
        Returns the target square for an en passant capture. If null, the last move was not a 2 squares pawn advance.

      • getCurrentMove

        protected int getCurrentMove()
        Returns the number of the current (full) move. A game starts at move 1 (so this is 1-based).

      • getKingPosition

        private java.util.Map<Piece.Color,Coordinate> getKingPosition()
        Returns a copy of the king position map.

        A copy is returned in order to prevent clients from changing the position's internal king position map.

      • at

        protected Piece at(Coordinate coordinate)
        Returns the piece at the given coordinate, or null if there isn't one.
